meanings.definition: A mound or hill in which fairies are believed to live.
meanings.sent1: The children played near the sidhe, hoping to catch a glimpse of fairies.
meanings.sent2: The villagers told stories of the magical sidhe hidden deep in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat wandered towards the sidhe, expecting to find tiny creatures inside.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination turned the sidhe into a mystical portal to another world.
meanings.sent5: The sidhe loomed in the distance, shrouded in mystery and wonder.

meanings.definition: A fairy or elf in Irish folklore.
meanings.sent1: The sidhe danced gracefully in the moonlight, enchanting all who watched.
meanings.sent2: Legends spoke of the powerful magic wielded by the ancient sidhe.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous sidhe played pranks on unsuspecting travelers along the path.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter tinkled like the bells of a sidhe, bringing joy to all around her.
meanings.sent5: The sidhe's ethereal beauty captivated the hearts of those who beheld her.
